not-found.not_found_on_server: was not found on this server.

email.note: Not your computer? Use Guest mode to sign in privately.

name-errors.enter_correct: Are you sure you entered your name correctly?

email-errors.email_exists: This email is already in use.
email-errors.not_valid: This email address is not valid.

password-errors.no_match: Those passwords didn't match. Try again.
password-errors.8_characters: Use 8 characters or more for your password

email.password_note: Use 8 or more characters with a mix of letters, numbers & symbols
email.figure_caption: One account. All of Google working for you.

detail.heading: welcome to Google
detail.info_button: Why we ask for this information
detail.figure_caption: Your personal info is private & safe

account-home.subheading: Manage your info, privacy, and security to make Google work better for you.
account-home.privacy_detail: See the data in your Google Account and choose what activity is saved to personalize your Google experience
account-home.personal_detail: Decide what personal information you make visible to others

personal-info.subheading: Info about you and your preferences across Google services
personal-info.profile_info_head: Your profile information in Google services
personal-info.profile_info_subheading: Personal information and options to manage it. You can make some of this info, like your contact details, visible to others so they can reach you easily. You can also see a summary of your profiles.
personal-info.basic_info_note: Some information may be visible to other people using Google services.
personal-info.other_info_head: Other information and preferences for Google services
personal-info.other_info_subheading: Ways to verify it's you and settings for the Web.
personal-info.password_note: A secure password helps protect your Google Account

personal-name.name: Name
personal-name.top_note: Changes to your name will be reflected across your Google Account.
personal-name.note: Anyone can see this info when they communicate with you or view content you create in Google services.

personal-birthday.top_note: Your birthday may be used for account security and personalization across Google services. If this Google Account is for a business or organization, use the birthday of the person who manages the account.

personal-gender.top_note: Your gender may be used for personalization across Google services, including how we refer to you.

personal-email.top_note: The address used to identify your Google Account to you and others.

personal-password.top_note: Choose a strong password and don't reuse it for other accounts.
personal-password.note: Use at least 8 characters. Don't use a password from another site, or something too obvious like your pet's name.

data-privacy.subheading: In the key privacy options, you can choose what data is saved in your account, the ads you see, the information you share with others and much more.
data-privacy.options_subheading: Other options to manage your data, such as choosing what happens to it if your account becomes inactive or is deleted.
data-privacy.delete_data: Delete your account and all data

data-delete.subheading: You're trying to delete your Google Account, which provides access to various Google services. You'll no longer be able to use any of those services, and your account and data will be lost.
data-delete.delete_confirm: Yes, I want to permanently delete this Google Account and all its data.
